testcase.name: TC01 Add product to the list and process
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "A101URL" webpage........................................passed Then accepts cookies........................................................passed Then hovers GiyimAksesuar button............................................passed Then clicks DizAltiCorap button.............................................passed Then clicks first product and confirms its black color......................passed Then clicks Sepete Ekle button..............................................passed Then clicks Sepeti Görüntüle button.........................................passed Then clicks Sepeti Onayla button............................................passed Then clicks Üye Olmadan Devam Et button.....................................passed Then enters email address and proceeds to payment page......................passed Then clicks Yeni adres olustur button.......................................passed Then fullfills requirements and saves address...............................passed Then proceeds to payment page...............................................passed Then verifys the last payment page..........................................passed
